entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 2.

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening with 40 percent chance of showers. Periods of rain beginning near midnight except periods of snow over higher terrain. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
